Also familiar with MS office suite applications. Assisted in promotional activities and product launches, supporting marketing events to enhance brand visibility and customer engagement.
  2. •

    Customer Support Lead

    Zoho Corporation

    2019 - 2023
    Started with a 3-person support team, handling diverse cases across multiple channels. At Zoho, I advanced from Customer Support Rep to Solutions Architect and later to Customer Support Lead for LATAM. I conducted training, webinars, and product demos, while also developing integrations and microservices. Promoted to Lead in 2021, I managed support operations, optimized team performance, enhanced reporting, and oversaw IT functions, Aircall system management, and marketing initiatives.
  3. •

    Freelance Developer

    Devector

    2018 - 2019
    As an independent Project Manager and co-founder, I oversaw hardware installation, computer maintenance, and server implementation for a local company. I also developed customized, responsive websites using Bootstrap, improving the online presence of an international consultancy. My role involved ensuring efficient project execution while adapting to client needs with strong management skills.
  4. •

    Cashier

    Sam's club

    2018
    As a Cashier at Sam’s Club, I handled transactions, maintained store cleanliness, stocked shelves, and assisted customers with product locations. I al so conducted satisfaction surveys, supported operations in cold storage, and focused on membership sales and renewals, meeting a strict monthly target of 30 to earn commissions. Through dedication and strong performance, I consistently met goals during my three-month contract, receiving a renewal offer, which I declined due better job offer.
  5. •

    Sales & Customer Service Manager

    Family Games

    2013 - 2018
    Running a video game retail and rental store was more than just managing a business—it was about creating an engaging space for gamers while ensuring operational excellence. I led daily operations, managed the team, and provided top-tier customer service. I designed rental promotions, optimized sales with a custom Excel macro system, and maintained gaming platforms. My focus on customer satisfaction, inventory control, and sales targets helped foster a welcoming environment and drive the store’s success.

About me

My name is Raul. I started programming using Notepad on a computer running Windows 95 when I was 11 years old. I'm currently working as a freelancer on various types of tasks and projects. I'm also working on practice projects and learning about new technologies, while taking online courses to earn certifications.

Some of my achievements include contributing to the growth of the first and only Zoho Corporation office in Latin America. Thanks to my performance and skills, I took on responsibilities across multiple areas, which led to three promotions: first as a Solutions Arquitect simultaneously as Senior Customer Support, and finally as Customer Support Lead.

Throughout my career, I have focused on optimizing the customer experience, leading strategic initiatives, and improving operational efficiency. At the same time, I enjoy continuously learning about programming and exploring new technologies, allowing me to maintain constant professional growth.
